Ten Minute Love

10(じゅっ)分(ぷん)の(の)恋(こい)juppun no koi

"Bus Stop Magic"

"Oh traveling bus, carry this love."
R

The story of the girl Rin, who falls in love with a boy she meets on the bus on her way to school.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song uploaded to niconico on February 28, 2008, and to piapro on March 9, 2008.
  • Remastered version: A revised version of the song featuring new vocals and instrumentals uploaded to piapro on April 18, 2008, and later featured on EVILS THEATER.

Albums

Notes

  • The PV's illustration was drawn by Taa.
  • mothy made the song in two weeks after purchasing Kagamine Rin & Len as a trial run.
  • The character featured in the PV appears identical to Kagamine Rin's VOCALOID2 module.
